events.title: Critical zero-day in OpenSSL under active exploitation globally
events.summary: Security researchers confirm a newly discovered OpenSSL vulnerability (CVE-2025-5023) actively exploited in multiple countries including digital infrastructure targets.

events.title: Chinese APT group expands operations targeting submarine cables in Asia-Pacific
events.summary: Analysis shows Chinese state-linked threat actors targeting undersea cable operators and satellite links across Asia-Pacific, positioning for hybrid influence operations.

events.title: Russia-linked group deploys living-off-the-land tools to breach Ukrainian power grid
events.summary: Investigators document a Russia-linked threat actor using trusted administrative tools (LOTL) in a wave of attacks on Ukraine’s energy sector; first signs of spill-over risk to NATO recent days.

events.title: Coordinated misinformation campaign targets Baltic states ahead of elections
events.summary: A coordinated digital influence campaign, likely linked to foreign state actors, has been detected pushing anti-NATO narratives and fake accounts across Baltic social media platforms.

events.title: US DHS issues advisories linking ransomware gangs to Chinese cloud infrastructure
events.summary: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security warns that major ransomware gangs now rely on Chinese-based cloud providers as safe haven; alert includes risk to allies and supply-chain networks.

events.title: NATO logistic hub disrupted by cyber-attack from unidentified actors, internal memo shows
events.summary: An internal memo from a NATO logistics centre disclosed a recent cyber-attack that disrupted supply-chain operations; [source anonymised] pending public release.

events.title: Massive phishing campaign uses LinkedIn levers to target European telecom executives
events.summary: Researchers identify LinkedIn-based spear-phishing campaign aimed at European telecom leadership, using decoy job offers and credential harvesting; potential upstream effect on critical backbone networks.

events.title: Australian energy grid targeted by new malware in operational environment
events.summary: A previously unknown malware family is found operating in an Australian utility’s SCADA environment, raising concerns about OT readiness and supply-chain risk.

events.title: Cyber espionage group leverages AI-generated phishing templates in new campaign
events.summary: Threat intelligence firm identifies a cyber espionage group using AI-generated email templates to spear-phish government targets in Middle East and Africa; campaign extends to social media lures.

events.title: Fake news network tied to foreign influence campaign floods South American social media
events.summary: A network of 500+ fake social-media accounts linked to a foreign state actor was found distributing narratives around economic sanctions and technology independence in South America.

events.title: European CERT issues advisory on new ICS encryption bypass vulnerability in transport sector
events.summary: CERT-EU issues an alert about a novel ICS encryption bypass vulnerability affecting European transport networks; advisory includes mitigation steps for operators.

events.title: Russian state-media amplifies claim of NATO cyber provocation ahead of drills
events.summary: Russian state-operated media outlets publish narratives accusing NATO of instigating cyber-attacks; part of hybrid information-operation in lead-up to upcoming Baltic exercises.

events.title: Indian telecom operator detects threats from Chinese-linked cyber espionage group
events.summary: Indian telecom provider reports intrusion attempts by China-linked group targeting 5G network components; investigation ongoing.

events.title: Norwegian energy sector flagged for elevated scanning and phishing activity – local CERT alert
events.summary: Norwegian CERT issues bulletin stating that energy companies in Norway have experienced elevated network scanning and targeted phishing attempts over last 48 hours. Operators urged to elevate detection thresholds.

events.title: German electronics company hit by supply-chain compromise; data exfiltrated
events.summary: German tech firm reports that attack on its subcontractor led to data exfiltration; supply-chain risk being assessed across EU manufacturers.
